name: Grand Superhero Rescue Mission
description:
Do you ever dream to become a superhero and help the citizen to led a peaceful life then play superhero rescue missions games because.......

The city is attacked by evil forces and people got troubled due to this inconsistency situations so super hero move to the city to help innocent people against bad enemies! Now be a Super Hero and rescue the fellows in danger who need your help and save them all. User your super power skills and fly high to rescue the nation.your country needs you, aliens and robotic nation from other planets is trying to invade your country/ This is the best time to help your fellow nation.


Game Features:
• Real Gangster Crime City Environment
• Flying Hero Fighting with City Mafia Gang
• Multiple Rescue Missions
• Incredible Hero Powers to save the people
• Addictive hero game with realistic sound effects
